page.title: 09Children's Days
page.content: Before play is over you can see the coach arrive. When play is finished we line up and class by class we go in. We are last most of the time.We go in and grab our bags and rush out to the coach and get on.But Class 1 don't go{swimming}because they're too young. We sit on the back of the coach if we can.It's fun going on the coach.When we get there the door is always shut. We go to{Christleton Baths}which is about 5km away.(J.P.) At the end of swimming we get to jump off the diving board and the coach takes us back to Dunham Hill. We get back to school at about 2.00 and have last play.We play the usual games.Then we go into school and have another lesson.Then sometimes at 3.00 we do {Cycling Proficiency.}Mr.Barrett does that at 3.30. We ride home.(R.H.)
